casebody.data:
Will HARRIS, Jr.
v.
AMERICAN HOME ASSURANCE COMPANY, Healthcare Casualty Insurance Limited, Aggreko, LLC, and Touro Infirmary No. 2018-C-589 Supreme Court of Louisiana. August 31, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FOURTH CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ORLEANS CRICHTON, J., would grant reconsideration I would grant applicant's request for reconsideration in this matter. See Marable v. Empire Truck Sales of La., LLC, 16-0876, 0877, 0878 (La. App. 4 Cir. 6/23/17), 221 So.3d 880 , writ denied , 17-1469 (La. 11/13/17), 230 So.3d 210 , reconsideration denied , 17-1469 (La. 11/17/17), 230 So.3d 212 . CLARK, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons.
